inclusion.criterion: Patients must have active multiple myeloma requiring first line treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female patient is either postmenopausal or surgically sterilized or willing to use an acceptable method of birth control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Expected survival of at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with abnormal kidney function, including patients on dialysis, are eligible if kidney insufficiency is secondary to multiple myeloma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have adequate liver functions
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior radiation therapy will be allowed but radiation therapy must be completed prior to registration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Serious medical or psychiatric illness likely to interfere with participation in this clinical study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient had a myocardial infarction within 6 months of enrollment, history of cardiac disease, or clinical evidence of congestive heart failure
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 64yo woman with multiple myeloma, s/p allogeneic transplant with recurrent disease and with systemic amyloidosis (involvement of lungs, tongue, bladder, heart), on hemodialysis for ESRD who represents for malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching x 2 days.
